title: Garen E bug
body: When Garen auto attack the Villain target, it will add 1% of target's max health true damage. But when Garen E hitting Villain target, it will add 1% of Garen's max health true damage.

replies.body:
Great catch! 
This has been fixed on the PBE and is ready for 5.18 ;)

Edit: It's in 5.19 not 5.18.
That would explain so much about Garen's power right now...
Not really, even in the most extreme circumstances it's around 25 damage difference. It's certainly extra power but it's not really the reason why he's strong.
Taking 250 true damage out of a basic ability, even a full channel, is a really really huge change. I think you're taking it a bit lightly.
